subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Lithuanian Ornithological Society (LOD) – BirdLife Lithuania seeks to conserve bird species in Lithuania by protecting their habitats and, through this, to work for the world's biological diversity and the sustainability of human use of natural resources. The LOD is the largest NGO in Lithuania, which is working on nature conservation issues. It has a unique position in promoting the results of management and monitoring to various local and national stakeholders, multipliers as well as general public in Lithuania.
